name: Lineage 2: The Chaotic Chronicle
description: Set 150 years before Lineage, Lineage II: The Chaotic Chronicle is designed to show the struggles that take place during a time when several provinces come under one rule. Who will you be in the struggle for power and glory? The game offers 5 races and 2 classes to choose from—wizard or warrior—and the character development system allows players to truly experience their avatar's growth in meaningful ways.
